LanguageData.ARA_HiveShip_Heart.label: Hunter Hive Ship - Core
LanguageData.ARA_HiveShip_Heart.description: It is the heart of the Arachne Colony's Hunter Hive Ship, and its function is similar to humanity's anti-gravity engine.
LanguageData.ARA_PilotConsole.label: neural link console
LanguageData.ARA_PilotConsole.description: The Neural Link Console is a platform used by the Arachne Hive to communicate and interact with Hunter Hive Ships.
LanguageData.ARA_HiveShip_Stomach.label: Hunter Hive Ship - Stomach Sac
LanguageData.ARA_HiveShip_Stomach.description: It is a gastric pouch provided in the Arachne colony's hunter hive ships, and its role is to store biomass for the hive ships to travel.
LanguageData.ARA_HiveShip_Tail.label: Hunter Hive Ship - Tail Thruster
LanguageData.ARA_HiveShip_Tail.description: It is an organ for the movement of hunter hive ships.
